title: How to Summon the Eye of Cthulhu in Terraria: Complete Guide

steps.title: The Eye of Cthulhu can be summoned automatically.
steps.content: The Eye of Cthulhu can be summoned automatically. This is one of the first bosses pre- Hardmode that players can encounter, as long as early game requirements are met. The requirements are as follows: At least one player must have at least 200 max Health (10 red hearts) At least one player must have 10 or more defense At least 4 town NPCs are present It must be night (7:30 PM in-game)

steps.title: Obtain a Suspicious Looking Eye.
steps.content: Obtain a Suspicious Looking Eye. This consumable item can be found in Gold or Frozen Chests in the Cavern and Dungeon, and Ivy Chest in the Underground Jungle biome . You can also use a Demon Altar or Crimson Altar to craft a Suspicious Looking Eye with 6 Lens.

steps.title: Use the Suspicious Looking Eye at night.
steps.content: Use the Suspicious Looking Eye at night. Night begins at 7:30 PM (in-game). [1] X Research source You'll see the message "You feel an evil presence watching youâ€¦" You can now fight and defeat the Eye of Cthulhu .
